plot: Documentary exploring the phenomenon of Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder in veterans and the variety of techniques that have been developed to help those who suffer from this "hidden wound" of war.
title: Taking the Hill: The Warrior's Journey Home
plot_es: Documentary exploring the phenomenon of Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder in veterans and the variety of techniques that have been developed to help those who suffer from this "hidden wound" of war.
original_name: Taking the Hill: The Warrior's Journey Home
plot_en: Documentary exploring the phenomenon of Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder in veterans and the variety of techniques that have been developed to help those who suffer from this "hidden wound" of war.
